Author: mineicals
Text: Eating my three regular meals a day is usually completely fine with me now. Whenever I overeat (over my TDEE, that is), I'm fine with it in the moment when I eat it, but I still panic afterwards almost every single time. Especially if I won't be able to exercise it off. It's mostly a, "fuck it, I've lost the weight once, I'll be able to do so again." The panic sets in when I remember how long it took the first time around, knowing that I can't restrict for longer than a week at a time now ðŸ˜…

Author: YouGoatToBeKittenMe
Text: I'm sorry to hear you're struggling to maintain control. I'm curious though, do you feel a sense of freedom from no longer caring as much? Is eating less stressful now?
